challenges.title: Weather App
challenges.description: Create a weather application that displays the current weather conditions for a given location. The application should be responsive and provide an intuitive user interface.
appRequirements: Display the current temperature
Show the weather conditions (e.g., sunny, cloudy, rainy)
Include a search bar to enter a location
Fetch weather data from an API
Handle errors if the API request fails
Display additional weather information (e.g., humidity, wind speed)
Use appropriate icons to represent weather conditions
Implement responsive design for different screen sizes

challenges.title: E-commerce Product Listing
challenges.description: Build a responsive product listing page for an e-commerce website. The page should display products in a visually appealing manner and provide filtering and sorting options for the user.
appRequirements: Display product images, titles, prices, and ratings
Implement filtering options (e.g., by category, price range)
Include sorting options (e.g., by price, popularity)
Implement pagination or infinite scrolling for large product lists
Allow users to add products to a shopping cart or wishlist
Implement responsive design for various devices
Include search functionality to find products
Provide a smooth and intuitive user experience

challenges.title: Task Management App
challenges.description: Create a responsive task management application that allows users to create, update, and organize tasks. The app should provide a clean and user-friendly interface for managing tasks effectively.
appRequirements: Allow users to create new tasks with a title and description
Implement task prioritization and due dates
Enable task editing and marking tasks as completed
Provide options for organizing tasks into categories or projects
Implement drag-and-drop functionality for task reordering
Include search and filtering options for finding specific tasks
Implement responsive design for different screen sizes
Store tasks persistently (e.g., using a backend or local storage)
Ensure a seamless and intuitive user experience

challenges.title: Recipe Finder
challenges.description: Develop a responsive recipe finder application that allows users to search for recipes based on ingredients or dish names. The app should display detailed recipe information and provide a visually appealing interface.
appRequirements: Include a search bar to enter ingredients or dish names
Fetch recipe data from an API
Display recipe images, titles, and cooking instructions
Provide filtering options (e.g., by cuisine, dietary restrictions)
Allow users to save favorite recipes or create a personal recipe collection
Implement responsive design for various devices
Include rating and review functionality for recipes
Enable sharing recipes through social media
Ensure a smooth and enjoyable user experience

challenges.title: Fitness Tracking App
challenges.description: Create a responsive fitness tracking application that helps users monitor their fitness activities and progress. The app should provide features for tracking workouts, setting goals, and visualizing fitness data.
appRequirements: Implement user registration and authentication
Allow users to log workouts and track exercise details
Provide features for setting fitness goals and tracking progress
Include visualizations and charts to display fitness data
Implement notifications or reminders for workout sessions
Include social features (e.g., following other users, sharing achievements)
Implement responsive design for different screen sizes
Store user data securely and privately
Ensure a seamless and motivating user experience

challenges.title: Event Management Platform
challenges.description: Build a responsive event management platform that allows users to create, manage, and promote events. The platform should provide features for event registration, ticketing, and attendee management.
appRequirements: Implement user registration and authentication
Allow event organizers to create and manage events
Provide features for event promotion and ticketing
Enable event registration and ticket purchase for attendees
Implement attendee management functionalities (e.g., check-in, attendee list)
Include event search and filtering options
Implement responsive design for various devices
Include social sharing and integration with social media platforms
Ensure a smooth and efficient event management experience
